nodes.nodeText: You sure do. First thing you'll want to know is how to move.

options.optionText: I already know this! Tell me the important stuff.

nodes.nodeText: Use the WASD keys to move around the map. It's pretty simple. Also remember to sprint with holding shift, your stamina will run out eventually but it will recharge.
Navigate to the exit tile to the right of the map, should be to your right and it will be pretty hard to miss.
And watch out for the spikes! They'll take away your health slowly. Once you've done that, you can go to the next level. Good luck!!
